Class ItemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.usecases.item.ItemUtility
      • org.twelve.usecases.item.ItemManager
  • public class ItemManager
extends ItemUtility
    Manager for items which edits items in the system.

      • addToItems

        public void addToItems​(int id,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       int ownerId,
                       boolean isApproved)
        Adds an item that exists in the DB to local storage.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to be added
        name - the name of the item to be added
        description - the description of the item to be added
        ownerId - the id of the owner of the item to be added
        isApproved - whether this item was approved by an admin
